1539201056_1ME6XkXNnT8wCQzMjpxNDDCB4uWkN.body:
the problem with filtering: you always have False Positives
both Black Sheep and White Wolves

this is why we have Two Stage Tests in Test Theory
Stage One = inclusive, find many positives, but also tolerate false positives
Stage Two = exclusive, filter out the false positives
other names: mutation + selection, eugenics + euthanasia

if the Four Quadrants are distributed equally
Stage One will select 3/4 = 75%
Stage Two will select 2/3 = 66%
so Stage Two usually has higher selectivity

look at humans
some prefer tolerance, others prefer separation
see Melting Pot vs Cultural Mosaic
or 'Left' vs 'Right' hand path

how to apply that 'useless theory' to bitmessage?

i would call it The Caravan Moves On

the caravan travels between desert and oase.
in the oase,
you have plenty resources, you are more free to play.
in the desert,
resources are limited, you are forced to prefer farsight.

oase translates to Public Chan or Blacklist Mode
where newcomers can play = introduce their talent

desert translates to Private Chan or Whitelist Mode
where trusted peers enjoy security

also look at other Secret Societies
and their hierarchy = pyramid
from tolerant outer circles
to exclusive inner circles

how to integrate Black Sheep?
you need Talent Scouts in the outer circles
who are trusted by inner circle peers
and have the hard job to 'stand bail' for their newcomer

how to fight White Wolves?
keep it small
if a group grows 'beyond reason'
or as soon as a White Wolf becomes black -- move on
split the large group in smaller fragments / compartments
and 'regroup' only the good apples
and maybe push the Wolf to outer circles,
where he-she-it can 'explain' or 'excuse' his trolling

periodic testing .... sleep wake cycles

also look at tags, or genres
with sub-genres merging into new genres, etc.

how is this different from a Web Of Trust?
cos a, it is more forgetful
and b, this model needs different Social Roles
which are constant over time

again, look at humans
some make better Talent Scouts
others make better Insiders

these Social Roles are very limited in numbers
only four roles should work = Four Elements
so you get Flat Hierarchies and good load balancing
with easy access to 'the one responsible' for his group
in contrast to imperialism and religion
where 'the one responsible' is always too far away
and in the end, no one is responsible

my world view overrates Inborn Dualisms
just like other views overrate Inborn Equality
to me, that is also an Inborn Dualism
to the others, it must be a Mental Disorder
to me, different Typical Stress Response

for more insight, read my #alchi code
here is one 'synth draft' in the tor network
http://m6su7s3ir7dxggwg.onion/haades/alchi
my model of group dynamics, game theory.

so much for my first post here ^____^ 

#tldr

alci
